title: [Icemule Trace, Exterior]
description: Snow drifts thicken the path as it moves parallel to the town walls and along the edge of the surrounding forest.  Several footsteps disturb the fresh powder and the crude shapes of snow angels grace the small field.  A single red mitten is half-buried near one of the smaller displays.

Snow drifts thicken the path as it moves parallel to the town walls and along the edge of the surrounding forest.  Several footsteps disturb the fresh powder and the crude shapes of snow angels can just barely be picked out under the brilliant starlight.
